title: Institute for Health & Healing | 2801 K Street
description: Contact Institute for Health & Healing | 2801 K Street at 9168874660. Institute for Health & Healing | 2801 K Street is located at 2801 K Street, Sacramento CA 95816 and is part of the Sutter Health Network.
cleaned_text: Institute for Health & Healing | 2801 K Street Network Affiliation - This location is part of Sutter Health's Sutter Medical Foundation. Hours: About Institute for Health & Healing | 2801 K Street Services in this location, which is part of Sutter Health's Sutter Medical Foundation, include: doctor and nurse practitioner consultations, Chinese medicine and acupuncture, functional medicine, integrative psychotherapy, nutrition, mind-body therapies and mindfulness-based stress reduction. Our team of board-certified, Western-trained doctors combine modern medical approaches with evidence-based integrative therapies to provide personalized care. We offer expertise and in-depth care plans to address preventative care and lifestyle change, as well as acute and chronic health issues in areas including autoimmune conditions, cancer treatment support, cardiovascular health, digestive disorders, emotional health, environmental issues, musculoskeletal health, neurological support, preventive care, sleep disorders, weight management and women's health. Services Offered The following services are available at this location.
